key_takeaways: Solution: Use robot mowers in landscaping service business model (Difficulty: intermediate)

Strategy: Build affiliate review website for robot lawn mowers
Strategy: Buy existing landscaping company and replace manual labor with robot mowers

startup_ideas.title: Robot mower landscaping service

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of comprehensive reviews for robot lawn mowers
